sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { PieChart } from "react-minimal-pie-chart"; class Calculator extends React.Component { state = { apiKey: "4b2ea96ceadc94e3995c", currency: "CAD", prev_currency: "CAD", defaultLabelStyle: { fontSize: "3px", fontFamily: "sans-serif", color: white }, cur_codes: { CAD: $, USD: $, NGN: ₦, EUR: €, INR: ₹, GBP: £, KRW: ₨, PHP: ₱, AED: د.إ, JPY: ¥ }, currencies: { CAD: "CAD", USD: "USD", NGN: "NGN", EUR: "EUR", INR: "INR", GBP: "GBP", KRW: "KRW", PHP: "PHP", AED: "AED", JPY: "CNY" }, values: { chequing: 2000.0, savings_for_taxes: 4000.0, rainy_day_fund: 506.0, savings_for_fun: 5000.0, savings_for_travel: 400.0, savings_for_personal_development: 200.0, investment_1: 5000.0, investment_2: 60000.0, investment_3: 24000.0, primary_home: 455000.0, second_home: 1564321.0, credit_card_1: 4342.0, credit_card_2: 322.0, mortgage_1: 250999.0, mortgage_2: 632634.0, line_of_credit: 10000.0, investment_loan: 10000.0 }, total_assets: 2120427.0, total_liabilities: 908297.0, net_worth: 1212130 }; convertCurrency = (fromCurrency, toCurrency) => { fromCurrency = encodeURIComponent(fromCurrency); toCurrency = encodeURIComponent(toCurrency); var query = fromCurrency + "_" + toCurrency; var url = "https://free.currconv.com/api/v7/convert?q=" + query + "&compact=ultra&apiKey=" + this.state.apiKey; fetch(url) .then(res => res.json()) .then(result => { result = result[query]; let updated_values = {}; for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(this.state.values)) { console.log(`${key}: ${value}`); var total = value * result; total = Math.round(total * 100) / 100; updated_values[key] = total; } this.setState({ values: updated_values, prev_currency: toCurrency }); this.getTotalAssets(); this.getTotalLiabilities(); this.getNetWorth(); console.log(this.state); }); }; getCurrency = e => { this.setState({ currency: e.target.value }); this.convertCurrency(this.state.prev_currency, e.target.value); }; getTotalAssets = () => { var total = this.state.values["chequing"] + this.state.values["savings_for_taxes"] + this.state.values["rainy_day_fund"] + this.state.values["savings_for_fun"] + this.state.values["savings_for_travel"] + this.state.values["savings_for_personal_development"] + this.state.values["investment_1"] + this.state.values["investment_2"] + this.state.values["investment_3"] + this.state.values["primary_home"] + this.state.values["second_home"]; this.setState({ total_assets: total }); console.log(this.state); }; getTotalLiabilities = () => { var total = this.state.values["credit_card_1"] + this.state.values["credit_card_2"] + this.state.values["mortgage_1"] + this.state.values["mortgage_2"] + this.state.values["line_of_credit"] + this.state.values["investment_loan"]; this.setState({ total_liabilities: total }); }; getNetWorth = () => { var total = this.state.total_assets - this.state.total_liabilities; this.setState({ net_worth: total }); }; numberWithCommas(x) { return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ","); } render() { return (

  Total Assets: {this.state.cur_codes[this.state.currency]} {this.state.total_assets}
  Total Liabilities: {this.state.cur_codes[this.state.currency]} {this.state.total_liabilities}
  Net Worth: {this.state.cur_codes[this.state.currency]} {this.state.net_worth}
`${Math.round(dataEntry.percentage)} %`} animation animationDuration={500} animationEasing="ease-out" center={[50, 50]} data={[ { title: "Assets", value: this.state.total_assets, label: this.state.total_assets, color: "#0066CC" }, { title: "Liabilities", value: this.state.total_liabilities, color: "#FFA500" }, { title: "Net Worth", value: this.state.net_worth, color: "#008000" } ]} labelPosition={90} labelStyle={this.state.defaultLabelStyle} lengthAngle={360} lineWidth={25} paddingAngle={0} radius={50} startAngle={0} viewBoxSize={[120, 120]} /> ;

); } } export default Calculator;
